/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun. Trees line the street, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm, inviting light.
